subject: Pocket Guide for JUnit 4
msgSnippet: Group, I am trying to make the case for O Reilly to publish an updated version of the JUnit Pocket Guide to cover JUnit 4. If you would like to see such a
messageBody:
Group,

I am trying to make the case for O'Reilly to publish an updated version of
the JUnit Pocket Guide to cover JUnit 4. If you would like to see such a
book, please email my editor, Mary O'Brien mailto:mary@..., and tell
her how many copies you and your group would purchase and why you would like
to see JUnit 4 covered. I think the pocket guides are an excellent way to
disseminate technical information and I would like to see the new version of
JUnit covered by one.

Sincerely yours,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
